Package fr.uparis.beryllium.model

Class Station

java.lang.Object
fr.uparis.beryllium.model.Station
public class Station extends Object
Our station class. Used to store all the data needed for each station, such as the location, the neighbors and the schedules.

  • Field Details

    • name

      private final String name
      Our station's name.

    • location

      private final Location location
      Our station's location.

    • nextStations

      private final HashMap<Station,ArrayList<NeighborData>> nextStations
      The neighboring stations of our stations.

    • lineSchedules

      private final LinkedHashMap<Line,ArrayList<LocalTime>> lineSchedules
      The line schedules of our station. Each station can have multiple lines, therefore, we stock here an ArrayList of all the times for each line, if at least one neighbor has this line (if to reach a certain neighbor, we need to take this line).

      public ArrayList<LocalTime> getSchedulesOfLine(Line line)
      Getter for the schedule of a certain line.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getNeighboringLines

      public ArrayList<String> getNeighboringLines()
      All neighboring lines, with the variant in line
      Returns:
      all lines of the current station to reach a neighboring station

    • getNeighboringLinesWithoutVariant

      public ArrayList<String> getNeighboringLinesWithoutVariant()
      All neighboring lines, without the variant in line
      Returns:
      all lines of the current station to reach a neighboring station

    • containsScheduleOnLine

      public boolean containsScheduleOnLine(Line line, LocalTime schedule)
      Parameters:
      line -
      schedule -
      Returns:
      true if the station contains the schedule for the line

    • addLineSchedule

      private void addLineSchedule(Line line, LocalTime time)
      Add time schedules for a specific line of this station. Doesn't check if a neighbor can be reached with this line. This checking wouldn't be needed anyway thanks to our path searching algorithm.
      Parameters:
      line - line to be added
      time - time to be added to the line

    • propagateSchedules

      public void propagateSchedules(LocalTime time, Line line)
      Recursive method used to propagate the schedules from a station to its neighbors
      Parameters:
      time - this station's time
      line - the concerned line in which we'll propagate the schedules

    • containsLine

      private boolean containsLine(Line line)
      Checks whether a line is present in any of our neighbors.
      Parameters:
      line - line to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the line is present in at least a neighbor, false otherwise

    • getNeighborsForLine

      private HashMap<Station,Long> getNeighborsForLine(String lineName)
      Gets all the neighbors that we can reach using a certain line.
      Parameters:
      lineName - name of the line
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all the neighbors that we can reach using lineName

    • addNextStation

      public void addNextStation(Station station, Line line, String[] durationArray, Double distance, Boolean addWalkingNeig)
      Add station as a neighbor.
      Parameters:
      station - the neighboring station
      line - the line to use to get station
      durationArray - the time it takes to reach station
      distance - the distance to travel to reach station
      addWalkingNeig - boolean that specifies whether this is a walking virtual station or not

    • sameStation

      public boolean sameStation(Station station)
      Checks if two stations are the same.
      Parameters:
      station - station to compare to this
      Returns:
      true if same stations, false otherwise

    • addWalkingNeighbours

      public void addWalkingNeighbours(Line walkingLine, ArrayList<Station> allStations, double radius, Boolean addFirstStation)
      Add all the walking neighbors.
      Parameters:
      walkingLine - the walking line
      allStations - the list of all existing stations
      radius - the distance we want the neighbors to be in
      addFirstStation - true if it's a virtual station, in which case we don't add this as a neighbor

    • isWithinARadius

      public boolean isWithinARadius(double radius, Location dest)
      Check if the station is within the radius we wanted.
      Parameters:
      dest - location of the destination point
      radius - the radius we wanted to be in (in km)
      Returns:
      a boolean that determines if the station is within the radius

    • getDistanceToAStation

      public double getDistanceToAStation(Location dest)
      Calculate the distance between our station and the destination point.
      Parameters:
      dest - location of the destination point
      Returns:
      the distance between our station and the destination point in km

    • getNextTrainTime

      public LocalTime getNextTrainTime(Line line, LocalTime time)
      Method used to get the next available train
      Parameters:
      line - The line for which we are looking for schedules
      time - The starting time for the search. This time is inclusive, meaning that it will return the next train that departs at or after this time.
      Returns:
      The next train time for the given line and starting time, or null if no such train exists.

      This station's name
